title: What Criteria Determine Whether a Customer Can be Serviced by an Automated Waste Collection Truck
content:
Switching to automated waste collection requires determining which
 customers cannot be collected by automated collection. The
 automated waste collection criteria that we evaluate each stop for
 are the following:
Author: By: Kevin Callen
